scenes.title: Three-front war, one new lever
scenes.main_point: AI raised expectations, broke distribution, and intensified competition—so growth shifted to trust.
scenes.scene_summary: AI raised expectations, collapsed channels, and attacked value props, so trust became the new playbook.
scenes.scene_prompt:
Delicate watercolor painting style, soft washes, visible brush strokes, muted tones.
In a modern office war-room, a startup founder stands at a whiteboard showing three clashing fronts labeled incumbents, startups, and customers, with AI icons pushing pressure arrows.
Broken distribution channels are sketched as cracked pipelines, while the founder circles a single word “TRUST” as the new lever, conveying tense focus.

scenes.title: Trust-based acquisition replaces broken channels
scenes.main_point: Traditional acquisition weakened; trust-forward channels like people, creators, community, and product experience worked.
scenes.scene_summary: SEO, SEM, and corporate social weakened, while people-led sharing and community drove word of mouth.
key_elements: SEO disrupted by AI answers and LLM navigation
SEM costs rising and ROAS pressure
Word of mouth as ultimate trust signal
scenes.scene_prompt:
Delicate watercolor painting style, soft washes, visible brush strokes, muted tones.
In the same war-room map setting, the same founder and small team turn away from fading SEO/SEM and corporate social charts, and instead connect a chain of people: an employee sharing openly, a creator passing along trust, and a small community circle trading user stories.
On the table, a simple “Cello” referral card anchors the word-of-mouth flow, with a calm, hopeful mood.

scenes.title: Trust-based retention becomes the moat
scenes.main_point: AI commoditized cost and efficiency value props; retention depended on confidence in ongoing outcomes and iteration.
scenes.scene_summary: As AI commoditized utility, customers stayed with products that kept earning trust over time.
key_elements: Value prop triad: cheaper, more efficient, more effective
AI outcompeting efficiency and cost claims
Trust as confidence in future outcomes
Operational shift: cross-functional alignment, velocity, build in public
Closing warning: channels and value props collapsing fast
scenes.scene_prompt:
Delicate watercolor painting style, soft washes, visible brush strokes, muted tones.
In the same war-room map setting, the same founder and cross-functional team calmly reinforce a stone moat labeled “Trust” around their product, while faded banners reading “Cheaper” and “More Efficient” drift away.
On a nearby board: a transparent roadmap, feedback notes turning into quick iterations, and a small “WOW” UX sketch; the mood is resolved and vigilant.
